name: The Lost Forest (golden.deer)
description:
For many years, you've travelled alongside your partner on many adventures; but your latest journey may well be your last. Your latest destination was a village neighbouring a mysterious forest where people have been going missing or, at worst, found dead. Your partner is now amongst the missing and now you've taken it upon yourself to search for her and uncover the mystery behind the disappearances.  

Collect clues to try and decipher the whereabouts of the missing and the identity of the beasts that lurk in the shadows. Make sure to make a note of your surroundings and stay on your guard; if you make good progress, you may discover something that wasn't there before..

Controls:

Use WASD to move around and the mouse to control the camera to collect up to five clues

Headphones are also recommended :)
